item.title: Fix for IE7 Beta 3 Install Problems
item.description: I finally succumbed and installed the latest beta of IE7 to check out the RSS features, or at least I tried to. Six attempts and no joy. I tried everything and more in their troubleshooting document. I went on to the support site and there was a link to the IE newsgroup. And within two minutes I had the solution! So much for TechnoGoogleYahooBlogosphericRati, good old 1980’s NNTP News got me the answer.
